 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עוּר‎</span>] **verb** ==rouse oneself, awake== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עוּר‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עיר‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַיִר‎</span>; <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, is ***be jealous***, compare Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***hate, revenge***); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְעוּרֶנּוּ‎</span> [[Job.41.2|Job 41:2]] [[BDB#Baer|Baer]] [[BDB#Gi|Ginsb]], and [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] [[BDB#van d.H.|van d. H.]], but [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יעירנו‎</span> (Hiph\`il), Babylonian Masora (see [[BDB#Baer|Baer]]<sup>p. 58</sup>), so [[BDB#Gi|Ginsb]]<sup>margin</sup> [[BDB#van d.H.|van d. H.]]; read thus, or <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְעוֺרְרֶנּוּ‎</span> (Po\`l.) [[BDB#Bu|Bu]]; &gt; contracted form of Po\`l. [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:72cc»§ 72cc</sup> [[BDB#Di|Di]]; compare [[BDB#Sta|Sta]]<sup>§ 484 e</sup>; ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע֫וּרָה‎</span> [[Ps.7.7|Ps 7:7]] +, feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע֫וּרִי‎</span> [[Judg.5.12|Judg 5:12]] (twice in verse) + 3 t., <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עוּרִ֫י‎</span> [[Judg.5.12|Judg 5:12]] (twice in verse) + 5 t. (for rhythm); ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵר‎</span> [[Song.5.2|Song 5:2]] + [[Mal.2.12|Mal 2:12]] (read probably <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵד‎</span> [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Now|Now]] [[BDB#GASm|GASm]], compare [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">ἕως</span> = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַד‎</span>); — ***rouse oneself*** to activity, of Deborah [[Judg.5.12|Judg 5:12]] (4 t. in verse); of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> [[Ps.7.7|Ps 7:7]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קוּמָה‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִנָּשֵׂא‎</span>), [[Ps.59.5|Ps 59:5]] (followed by infinitive), [[Ps.44.24|Ps 44:24]] (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָשֵׁן‎</span>), of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>'s arm [[Isa.51.9|Isa 51:9]] (3 t. in verse), of oneself [[Ps.57.9|Ps 57:9]], of Zion [[Isa.52.1|Isa 52:1]] (twice in verse), of stone (idol) [[Hab.2.19|Hab 2:19]], sword [[Zech.13.7|Zech 13:7]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> ***against***), wind [[Song.4.16|Song 4:16]], harp and lyre [[Ps.57.9|Ps 57:9]] = [[Ps.108.3|Ps 108:3]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִבִּי עֵר‎</span> [[Song.5.2|Song 5:2]] ***my heart waketh*** (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָשֵׁן‎</span>). — [[Job.41.2|Job 41:2]]; [[Mal.2.12|Mal 2:12]] see above **Niph\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֵעוֺר‎</span> [[Zech.2.17|Zech 2:17]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יֵעוֺר‎</span> [[Jer.6.22|Jer 6:22]]; [[Zech.4.1|Zech 4:1]] 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יֵעֹרוּ‎</span> [[Jer.50.41|Jer 50:41]]; [[Job.14.12|Job 14:12]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יֵעוֺרוּ‎</span> [[Joel.4.12|Joel 4:12]] — ***be roused*** [[Zech.4.1|Zech 4:1]] (from [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span>] sleep, in simile), so [[Job.14.12|Job 14:12]] (sleep of death, \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָקִיצוּ‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָקוּם‎</span>); ***be incited*** to activity, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> local: of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> [[Zech.2.17|Zech 2:17]], of nation [[Jer.6.22|Jer 6:22]], kings [[Jer.50.41|Jer 50:41]], whirlwind [[Jer.25.32|Jer 25:32]] absolute of nations [[Joel.4.12|Joel 4:12]]. **Po\`el.** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עוֺרֵר‎</span> [[2Sam.23.18|2Sam 23:18]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְע‎</span> consecutive [[Isa.10.26|Isa 10:26]], 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְעוֺרַרְתִּ֫י‎</span> [[Zech.9.13|Zech 9:13]], suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עוֺרַרְתִּיךָ‎</span> [[Song.8.5|Song 8:5]] ***Imperfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּעֹרֵר‎</span> [[Prov.10.12|Prov 10:12]], 2 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּעוֺרְרוּ‎</span> [[Song.2.7|Song 2:7]]; [[Song.3.5|Song 3:5]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּעֹרְרוּ‎</span> [[Song.8.4|Song 8:4]] (feminine subject [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:144a»§ 144a</sup>); ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עוֺרְרָה‎</span> [[Ps.80.3|Ps 80:3]] ***Infinitive*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֹרֵר‎</span> [[Job.3.8|Job 3:8]] — ***rouse, incite*** to activity, with accusative of person [[Zech.9.13|Zech 9:13]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> ***against***), accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רְפָאִים‎</span> [[Isa.14.9|Isa 14:9]] (subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁאוֺל‎</span> see [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:145t»§ 145t</sup>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶתגְּֿבוּרָתֶ֑ךָ‎</span> [[Ps.80.3|Ps 80:3]] (of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָעֲתִידִים עֹרֵר לִוְיָתָן‎</span> [[Job.3.8|Job 3:8]] especially ***rouse, excite*** love [[Song.2.7|Song 2:7]]; [[Song.3.5|Song 3:5]]; [[Song.8.4|Song 8:4]] (all \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּעִירוּ‎</span>; feminine subject see [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:144a»§ 144a</sup>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עוֺרַרְתִּיךָ‎</span> [[Song.8.5|Song 8:5]] is dubious, of exciting love [[BDB#De|De]], arousing from slumber [[BDB#Bu|Bu]], so, reading <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עוֺרַרְתִּיךְ‎</span>, [[BDB#Siegf|Siegf]]; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְדָנִים‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׂנְאָה תְּע‎</span> [[Prov.10.12|Prov 10:12]] ***hatred stirreth up strifes***; with accusative of weapon [[2Sam.23.18|2Sam 23:18]] ***rouse, awaken***, i.e. ***wield, brandish*** (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> ***against***), so read also v[[2Sam.23.8|2Sam 23:8]] (see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֲנִית‎</span> **1**) = [[1Chr.11.11|1Chr 11:11]]; [[1Chr.11.20|1Chr 11:20]], so [[Isa.10.26|Isa 10:26]]. — [[Isa.23.13|Isa 23:13]] see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ערר‎</span>. **Pilpel** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זַעֲקַתשֶֿׁבֶר יְעֹעֵ֑רוּ‎</span> [[Isa.15.5|Isa 15:5]], usually explained as = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְעַרְעֵ֑רוּ‎</span> (which some read), ***rouse*** (i.e. ***raise ?***) ***a cry of destruction***, [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>Comm.</sup> [[BDB#Thes|Thes]]. [[BDB#De|De]] [[BDB#Di|Di]] [[BDB#Du|Du]] [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:72cc»§ 72cc</sup> [[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>i. 500; ii. 497</sup>; Pilpel not elsewhere, very dubious; read perhaps <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְעוֺרֵ֑רוּ‎</span>; [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>Proph. Chald. IL</sup> [[BDB#Che|Che]] [[BDB#Gu|Gu]]<sup>Kau</sup> [[BDB#SS|SS]] read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְרֹעָ֑עוּ‎</span> ***shout***, but improbable with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זַעֲקַת‎</span>. **Hithpo\`lel** ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהִתְעֹרַ֫רְתִּי כִּי‎</span> consecutive [[Job.31.29|Job 31:29]] ***and I was*** (joyfully) ***excited, triumphant***, that (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶשְׂמַח‎</span>), so perhaps ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular [[Job.17.8|Job 17:8]], reading <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְחָנֵף עַלנָֿקִי יִתְעֹרָ֑ר‎</span> [[BDB#Me|Me]] [[BDB#Di|Di]] Beer ([[BDB#MT|ᵑ0]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְנָקִי עַלחָֿנֵף יִתְע‎</span> i.e. ***be excited with displeasure***); ***rouse oneself*** to activity, Participle <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִתְעוֺרֵר לְהַחֲזִיק בָּךְ‎</span> [[Isa.64.6|Isa 64:6]]. **Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵעִיר‎</span> [[Isa.41.2|Isa 41:2]] +; 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַעִיר֫וֺתִי‎</span> [[Isa.41.25|Isa 41:25]] (see [[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>i. 500</sup> [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:72x»§ 72x</sup>), suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַעִירֹתִהוּ‎</span> [[Isa.45.13|Isa 45:13]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָעִיר‎</span> [[Deut.32.11|Deut 32:11]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְיָעֵר‎</span> [[Dan.11.25|Dan 11:25]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיָּ֫עַר‎</span> [[Hag.1.14|Hag 1:14]] +, suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְעִירֵנִי‎</span> [[Zech.4.1|Zech 4:1]], etc.; ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָעִירָה‎</span> [[Ps.35.23|Ps 35:23]] masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָעִירוּ‎</span> [[Joel.4.9|Joel 4:9]] ***Infinitive*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּעִיר‎</span> (= <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּהָעִיר‎</span>) [[Ps.73.20|Ps 73:20]] ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:53q»§ 53q</sup>); ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵעִיר‎</span> [[Isa.13.17|Isa 13:17]] +, suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְעִירָם‎</span> [[Joel.4.7|Joel 4:7]] — 

**1.** ***rouse***, with suffix [[Zech.4.1|Zech 4:1]] (as if from sleep, see **Qal**); ***rouse, stir up***, to activity, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּנֶשֶׁר יָעִיר קִנּוֺ‎</span> [[Deut.32.11|Deut 32:11]] with accusative of person, or equivalent, expressed or implied, especially subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>: [[Isa.45.13|Isa 45:13]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> local [[Isa.41.2|Isa 41:2]]; [[Isa.41.25|Isa 41:25]]; [[Joel.4.7|Joel 4:7]] + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> ***against*** [[Isa.13.17|Isa 13:17]], compare [[Jer.50.9|Jer 50:9]]; [[Jer.51.1|Jer 51:1]]; [[Ezek.23.22|Ezek 23:22]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵעִיר אֶתרֿוּחַ פ‎</span> [[Jer.51.11|Jer 51:11]]; [[Hag.1.14|Hag 1:14]]; [[1Chr.5.26|1Chr 5:26]]; [[2Chr.21.16|2Chr 21:16]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> ***against***), [[2Chr.36.22|2Chr 36:22]] = [[Ezra.1.1|Ezra 1:1]], compare v[[Ezra.1.5|Ezra 1:5]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> subject also in following: <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָעִיר קִנְאָה‎</span> [[Isa.42.13|Isa 42:13]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָעִיר‎</span> [[Isa.50.4|Isa 50:4]] (twice in verse) (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִי אֹזֶן‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָעִיר כָּלחֲֿמָתוֺ‎</span> &lt;BIBLE:Psalm 78:39&gt;; human subject, with accusative of person [[Joel.4.9|Joel 4:9]], [[Dan.11.2|Dan 11:2]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֵת‎</span> in conflict ***with***, [[BDB#Vg|ᵑ9]] [[BDB#De W|de We]] [[BDB#Meinh|Meinh]] [[BDB#Behrm|Behrm]], compare [[BDB#Bev|Bev]] who thinks <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יערך לקראת‎</span> possibly); perhaps also, object crocodile [[Job.41.2|Job 41:2]] (reading <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְעִירֶנּוּ‎</span> see **Qal**); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְיָעֵר כֹּחוֺ וּלְבָבוֺ‎</span> [[Dan.11.25|Dan 11:25]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> ***against***); especially of ***rousing*** love [[Song.2.7|Song 2:7]]; [[Song.3.5|Song 3:5]]; [[Song.8.4|Song 8:4]] (all \|\| **Po\`l.** q. v.); figurative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָעִירָה שָׁ֑חַר‎</span> [[Ps.57.9|Ps 57:9]] ***I will arouse the dawn*** (\|\| Imperative **Qal** q. v.); participle absolute = ***stirring up*** (a fire) [[Hos.7.4|Hos 7:4]] (si vera 1.; compare [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:120b»§ 120b</sup>; but text dubious compare [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Now|Now]] [[BDB#GASm|GASm]]). 

**2.** declarative or exhibitive sense, ***act in an aroused manner, awake***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָעִירָה וְהָקִיצָה לְמִשְׁפָּטִי‎</span> [[Ps.35.23|Ps 35:23]], compare [[Job.8.6|Job 8:6]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> ***over*** = ***for***; both subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>); absolute [[Ps.73.20|Ps 73:20]].
